column5: overview
Desperate to save his village from financial ruin, a farmer travels overseas in search of greener pastures. However, his life turns upside down after he becomes the target of a criminal nexus.
While getting prepared for his sister's wedding, a young man attempts to woo a girl whose marriage to another man has already been fixed.

A Sikh serving in the British Indian Army is deputed to Europe to fight in World War I.
This film is based on Sikh regiments that went to the front lines during WWI. Sajjan Singh, a polo aficionado, was a British Indian Army officer and Maharaja of Ratlam State, ruling from 1893-1947. He served on the Western Front during WWI.
Jeet is a free-spirited youth in the village, but he does not care or have any goals in life. But his life changes, when he meets Teg, a beautiful young girl from another village.

A story about unrequitted love - the shapes it takes, the ways it change us and the exhilarating and often heartbreaking role it take us on. Following Shiv, Bani and Majaz as they navigate through life, love and sorrow.
Jaggi, a farmer, and Raunak, a young woman, love each other and wish to get married. However, they face several challenges in their quest to unite.

Jass falls in love with Mahie who wants to marry an orphan, so he lies to her and tells her he has no family, and finds himself in hilarious situations when he has to hide the truth once they get married.

Nikka's grandfather, Bhaag Singh, is a wealthy miserly owner; however, the day after his death, his family spends his savings; the spirit of Bhaag Singh then enters the body of Nikka to express his dissatisfaction.
A group of six illegal immigrants from India and Pakistan living in Birmingham experience difficulties, but find solidarity in their shared quest for a residence card.
Babbu is in love with Sargi since their college days. Sargi fakes a marriage to travel abroad to support her family, and is stuck between three eligible suitors who have fallen in love with her.
Revolving around family problems, love, hate and much more. A couple from vastly different economic backgrounds struggle to keep their budding romance alive amidst escalating family pressure

When Makhan falls in love with a girl after seeing just her eyes, he and his uncle go to hilarious lengths to find her. Utter chaos follows when they realize they've arranged a wedding with the wrong girl. As the pressure mounts to clear up the confusion, the very integrity of their family is threatened.
A man is desperate to find a match because of his increasing age, but makes everyone uncomfortable and gets into trouble every time he meets a gorgeous girl.

Tara's father wants only the Jatt community to reside in Punjab. Tara mistakes his love interest Mira as a Punjabi, but in reality, she belongs to the same caste his father is biased against. Tara requests Mira's family to pretend to be Jatts but the game of lies soon leads to confusion and chaos as they try to find a way to be together.
The patriarch of a wealthy family has one industrious son and one who is a playboy, and accidentally arranges the marriage of one to the woman the other loves.
After Shinda gets married to Taaro, he must wait for a certain period of time to meet her due to an old custom called 'Muklawa' where the bride goes back to her mother's house after her marriage.
The film depicts the story of a divorced father who is raising his son on his own. When he starts dating, romance and comedy ensue.
Lattu, an aspiring singer, is in love with Sweety, a model, and wishes to date her. Soon, his dream of being together with her comes true but with a hilarious twist.
The film starring Diljit Dosanjh and Neeru Bajwa, follows the story of an average man looking for a bride and what happens when he finally marries a girl who thinks marriage is beautiful.
Two former prison inmates and friends endeavour to turn over a new leaf. However, since starting over is tougher than it sounds, they think of a unique business idea to make money.

A romantic comedy set in the lush fields of Punjab and the beautiful city of Chandigarh - Aa Gaye Munde U.K. De is a sequel to the earlier blockbuster Munde U.K. De also Directed by the Doyen of Punjabi cinema.
Two very close friends, Yuvraj and Gurnoor, fall in love with the same girl, Noor and they decide to win her heart through various methods.
After his father's demise due to poverty, Mukhtiar dreams of being wealthy and enters the real estate business. However, trouble ensues when he comes into conflict with a mafia group.

A couple after six years of marriage are bored from each other. To spice things up, both of them open fake Facebook accounts. But things go sideways when, accidentally, they befriend each other on Facebook.

A man tries robbing a bank so he can be wealthy enough to marry the love of his life. He ends up getting caught, but it turns out that he has a much bigger plan in mind that involves one of Punjab's biggest criminals.
The lives of four brothers change when they receive news of ancestral property, which is under their name. However, the land is in the possession of two ruthless feudal lords.
The brother of a well-known gangster falls in love with the sister of a respected policeman while training for a wrestling tournament.
Geja fails to assassinate Pamma and ends up in the same jail, where he's intent on finishing the job. A merciless cop's plan to transfer the dangerous prisoners escalates the situation.
Manga Singh Antal is a young athlete who falls prey to drugs and gets involved in criminal activities. Furthermore, these actions sabotage his sanity and relationships.
Moosa, who is brought up by his uncle, finds out that his parents died due to the evil deeds of a land mafia. He then decides to bring the culprits to justice and protect the farmers from harassment.
Sikander leaves his dark past behind and starts living a new life with an adoptive family in a distant village. However, he is forced to go back to his old ways to save the son of the family.
The story revolves around a bunch of Indians in the US trying to keep the Bollywood spirit alive.

It is a biographical feature film on India's Highest Wartime Gallantry Award - Param Vir Chakra winner Subedar Joginder Singh. He fought three wars for India before achieving martyrdom in the Sino-Indian War of 1962.
Kaptaan, a carefree advocate, needs to win at least one big case to obtain his father's permission to get married. His love Preeti helps him get a case for an NRI but he must face a strong opponent.
Kabaddi champion of the village, Jind raises her son to be the most honest and reputable player. Unfortunately, the son gets addicted to drugs, threatening to destroy himself and his mother.

A kind, virtuous, and lion-hearted Dulla takes it upon himself to fight against a corrupt but powerful landowner who has terrorised the villagers and caused havoc as a result of his nefarious activities.
Rocky, a national-level boxer, earns Maninder's wrath after he gets close to his girlfriend Ibadat. Maninder frames Rocky in a rape case and kills his best friend Preet.
Pamma is an ambitious youngster from Punjab who wants to go abroad. He runs into difficulty and danger while attempting to enter America illegally through the jungles of Mexico.
As Guri, Tink and Deep find love in college, misunderstandings and barriers in communication threaten their strong bond.
A Punjabi Indian boy's journey from India to Pakistan. He leaves for Europe to

A Punjabi Indian boy's journey from India to Pakistan. He leaves for Europe to become rich so that he can fulfill his grandmother's dream. But ends up in Pakistan and gets abundant love there. While in Pakistan, Iqbal lands himself with a job in a Haveli which is owned by Abbaji, a powerful politician. Abba ji has an autistic daughter whom he loves immensely.

Bhagel Singh overhears two sisters from Zimidaar's family singing and seeks their father's permission to have them sing at his company. He agrees, on the condition that their identities remain hidden.

Rano grew up dreaming of marrying a Prince Charming from Canada, but soon realises she will not be able to attract a groom from there. Her world falls apart when she is forced to marry Sukha, who she dislikes.

Set in the 90's, the film revolves around how the forced respect for the son-in-laws of the family serves as an obstacle in the marriage functions and also, their contribution in uniting new love lives.
Ajit Singh, Jujhar Singh, Zorawar Singh, and Fateh Singh, the four sons of Guru Gobind Singh Ji, sacrifice their lives in an important battle against the Mughals.
A Punjabi family who resides in Canada, decides to return to India, which makes the elder members happy. However, the different approaches of the young and the old generations turn things chaotic.
A child who is suffering from depression due to his parents' fights is told to visit his hometown by his psychiatrist. As he spends his days there with his relatives, he starts to recover.

Kainat and Jagat try to keep their relationship a secret due to the stark difference in their social status. When Kainat's influential father and brother learn about this, they swear to separate them.
Laadi leaves his studies due to his stammering. Years later, he finds employment with his uncle, a lawyer, and chooses to defend four women charged with murder.
Sundeep leads a double life when he marries two women and keeps them from one another. His carefully planned life unravels when an old friend who knows his secret arrives looking to fall in love.
From selling underwear to adopting a father for insurance benefits, Diljit will stop at nothing for him and his friends to become the three richest men in the world.
A budding lawyer finds out about the injustice suffered by her school teacher Rabia in a male-dominated society and fights for her.
Kikkar Singh, a Sikh man from India, and Ameeran, a Muslim woman from Pakistan, fall in love. However, tragedy strikes during the partition of India, forcing them to separate.

This comical movie is a Punjabi Example of West-East Conciliation. The movie is about a Punjabi boy, Roop, who hails from a family which sees Englishmen with vengeance. Roop falls in love with a Caucasian girl and wants to marry her.
Geja falls in love with Maarho. When her family learns of their relationship, it is scorned upon.Before their love fully blooms, a rich man enters Maarho's life and Geja finds solace in Dhan Kaur.
